### 0.0.1 - 23-OCT-2014

* Add client for non-project resources
  * project group
  * project type
  * locales
  * project (partially)

* Add project for project based resources
  * project
  * file
  * translation
  * import task
  * order
  * quotation

### 1.0.0 - 31-DEC-2014

* Add custom header for OneSky
* Set as stable version

### 1.0.1 - 9-JUN-2015

* Update rest-client version
